column5: looking for a good place to go ice fishing this winter. Have never tried it so I need to find a Lodge in Ontario that can set up an idiot like me and my buddy to catch some fish....
Hi Andrew,Check out www.sawmill-lodge.com in Byng Inlet on Georgian Bay, just 45 minutes North of Parry Sound On.
check out www.winogalodge.com, have gone several times and had excellent time
what part of ontario would you like to fish? also what kind of fish would you be looking to catch? the next question is the month you would want to try?
